byline.contributor: Henrick Karoliszyn reported from Franklin, and Leslie Turk from Lafayette, La.
byline.original: By HENRICK KAROLISZYN and LESLIE TURK

abstract: Hundreds of mourners attend funeral services in Lafayette, La, for Mayci Breaux and Jillian Johnson, two people killed by John R Houser when he opened fire inside local movie theater; Houser wounded nine others before turning gun on himself.
lead_paragraph: Funeral services were held in Franklin and Lafayette, La., for the two victims of the shooting at a movie theater in Lafayette last week.

headline.main: An Outpouring of Support as Two Towns Mourn Lafayette Shooting Victims
headline.print_headline: An Outpouring of Support as Two Louisiana Towns Mourn Shooting Victims

snippet: Funeral services were held in Franklin and Lafayette, La., for the two victims of the shooting at a movie theater in Lafayette last week.
